ValidationRule.description: Date of First Treatment or Month of First Treatment must be entered
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK( Date_of_First_Treatment__c ), ISBLANK( Month_MM_YY_FirstTreatment_No_Date__c ), RecordType.DeveloperName = "Short_Term_Disability" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: CL-009 Either of First Treatment or Month of First Treatment Must be Entered
